alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 9:35PM EDT until April 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR THURSDAY... Unseasonably warm temperatures and a dry air mass is forecast on Thursday, with relative humidity values dipping into the 20 to 25 percent range. Additionally, breezy southwesterly surface winds of 10 mph to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph will lead to elevated fire danger across the area Thursday afternoon and early evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN KENTUCKY... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 056 Licking, Fire Weather Zone 064 Pickaway, Fire Weather Zone 065 Fairfield, Fire Weather Zone 073 Ross, Fire Weather Zone 074 Hocking, Fire Weather Zone 078 Clermont, Fire Weather Zone 079 Brown, Fire Weather Zone 080 Switzerland, Fire Weather Zone 080 Highland, Fire Weather Zone 081 Adams, Fire Weather Zone 082 Pike, Fire Weather Zone 088 Scioto, Fire Weather Zone 089 Carroll, Fire Weather Zone 090 Gallatin, Fire Weather Zone 091 Boone, Fire Weather Zone 092 Kenton, Fire Weather Zone 093 Campbell, Fire Weather Zone 094 Owen, Fire Weather Zone 095 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 096 Pendleton, Fire Weather Zone 097 Bracken, Fire Weather Zone 098 Robertson, Fire Weather Zone 099 Mason and Fire Weather Zone 100 Lewis. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop on Thursday will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.
